/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The sky is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it. The sun is shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene.

The street itself is lined with trees on both sides, their leaves a vibrant green. These trees form a natural canopy over the street, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. On the right side of the street, there are buildings visible, their details slightly obscured by the distance.

The image is taken from the perspective of a car on the street, as evidenced by the presence of a car in the foreground. This gives a sense of depth to the image, drawing the viewer's eye from the car in the foreground, along the length of the street, and towards the buildings in the background.

Overall, the image provides a detailed and vivid depiction of a typical street in Beijing, showcasing the city's blend of urban development and natural beauty.
